AT.name: TRANSFORMERS PRIME™ The Game
AT.description: Help OPTIMUS PRIME and the AUTOBOTS join forces with human friends Jack, Miko and Raf to save the Earth from MEGATRON and his new secret weapon. Play as one of your favorite AUTOBOT characters including BUMBLEBEE and BULKHEAD as you battle through unique vistas around the world to help defeat the DECEPTICONS. Continue the battle against your friends in Multiplayer Mode with 11 playable characters. TRANSFORMERS PRIME is a third-person action-brawler with a mix of shooting, driving and melee combat. Change form and power up each AUTOBOT as you battle against the DECEPTICONS.

Continue the battle against your friends in Multiplayer Mode with 11 playable characters. TRANSFORMERS PRIME is a third-person action-brawler with a mix of shooting, driving and melee combat. Change form and power up each AUTOBOT as you battle against the DECEPTICONS.

BE.name: TRANSFORMERS PRIME™ The Game
BE.description: Aidez OPTIMUS PRIME et les AUTOBOTS à s'allier à leurs amis humains Jack, Miko et Raf pour protéger la Terre de MÉGATRON et de sa nouvelle arme secrète. Incarnez l'un de vos AUTOBOTS préférés, dont BUMBLEBEE et BULKHEAD, et livrez bataille aux quatre coins du monde, dans des paysages fantastiques, pour vaincre les DECEPTICONS. Poursuivez le combat contre vos amis en mode multijoueur avec 11 personnages jouables. TRANSFORMERS PRIME est un jeu de combat/action en vue objective qui mêle tir, conduite et combats au corps à corps. Transformez-vous et faites évoluer chaque AUTOBOT au fil de votre lutte contre les DECEPTICONS.

ES.name: TRANSFORMERS PRIME™ The Game
ES.description: Ayuda a OPTIMUS PRIME y a los AUTOBOTS a colaborar con sus amigos humanos, Jack, Miko y Raf, para salvar la Tierra de MEGATRON y de su nueva arma secreta. Juega con uno de tus personajes AUTOBOT favoritos, como BUMBLEBEE o BULKHEAD, y lucha en escenarios únicos de todo el mundo para ayudar a derrotar a los DECEPTICONS. Sigue con la batalla contra tus amigos en modo multijugador, con 11 personajes con los que jugar. TRANSFORMERS PRIME es un juego de acción y lucha que combina tiroteos, carreras de vehículos y combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Cambia de forma y acompaña a los AUTOBOTS en su batalla contra los DECEPTICONS.

PT.name: TRANSFORMERS PRIME™ The Game
PT.description: Ajuda o OPTIMUS PRIME e os AUTOBOTS a unir forças com os humanos amigos Jack, Miko e Raf para salvar a terra do MEGATRON e a sua nova arma secreta. Joga na pele de um dos teus AUTOBOTS preferidos, incluindo BUMBLEBEE e BULKHEAD enquanto combates em cenários únicos em redor do mundo para ajudar a derrotar os DECEPTICONS. Continua a batalha contra os teus amigos no modo Multijogador com 11 personagens jogáveis. TRANSFORMERS PRIME é um jogo de lutas na primeira pessoa com um misto de tiro, condução e combate de proximidade. Muda de forma e dá potência a cada um dos AUTOBOTS combatendo contra os DECEPTICONS.
